Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies are sixth in majors in runs scored while sitting fourth in batting average, fifth in on-base percentage, and seventh in slugging.
The Marlins are 29th in the majors in runs scored, while sitting 19th in batting average, 29th in on-base percentage, and 26th in slugging.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seth Johnson makes his major league debut as the Philadelphia Phillies face the Miami Marlins.
The Phillies are slugging well, and scoring over 4.5 runs per game as of late.
The Marlins have just 12 extra-base hits in their last 211 plate appearances.
Others: The Phillies have a runs-created total of 31.3 in the last week, but have scored just 27 runs.
Max Meyer has struggled as of late, giving up four or more runs in six of his last seven starts.
